servinfo.title: Automatic Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting

s1.ptxt: Dismount engine with transmission and transfer referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .

Disconnect connectors from output shaft speed sensor, input shaft speed sensor, transmission range sensor, transmission wire, transfer actuator, differential lock switch and 4L/N switch release their wire harnesses from clamps.
Remove engine rear mounting member and rear mounting.
Remove drive plate cover, and then remove drive plate bolts by holding crankshaft pulley bolt stationary.
Remove Starting Motor referring to Starting Motor Dismounting and Remounting .
Remove transmission assembly from engine assembly.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: For remounting, reverse dismounting procedure noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Tighten each bolts and nuts referring to Automatic Transmission Unit Components
Tighten drive plate bolt No.1 (1) first and then tighten drive plate bolts No.2 (2).
Set each clamp for wiring securely.
Fill A/T fluid referring to A/T Fluid Change .
Connect battery and check function of engine and transmission.
